==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=厂09}}

====Readings====
* {{ja-readings|on=[[し]] (shi)|kun=[[かわや]] (kawaya)}}

===Etymology===
Generally thought to be a compound of ''[[川|kawa]]'' and ''[[屋|ya]]''. Literally "river house", specifically a small building erected either near or over a stream used as a toilet.

The kanji 厠 is [[ateji]]. Other ateji include [[圊]] and [[溷]].

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かわや|hku=かはや|hhira=かはや}}

# A place used for excreting human waste. Toilet.
